name: Completely Paranormal
description:
It’s just another relaxing day as a ghost.

You float around your humble haunted home, reading books, lounging about, trying on different sheets - oh that one is SO your color! Everything is peaceful, and you live - er, die? - in total bliss.

Knock knock, it’s a blogger!

Buford B. Blevins, part-time paranormal investigator and full-time gamer, is on the case! Before you can react, the man barges into your home dead-set on proving to the world that ghosts are real! What a looney...

There’s just one problem...

Your house is haunted. Like, super haunted. Like really, really, absolutely haunted. You really can’t miss it, the piano plays itself for crying out loud. If the investigator finds out, your house will be swarmed by the media!

Over my dead body.

There’s no way you’re letting your blissful peace be broken by a man in a fedora. You puff out your chest, clench your fist, and set to work de-haunting the house. Except you don’t have a chest. Or hands. Good luck buddy.

How to Play:

WASD to move about the house.

E to interact with haunted objects.

A variety of keyboard inputs across more than a dozen minigames!

Randomized hauntings and investigator paths.

Increased difficulty as suspicion grows.

Team Five Random Guys:

Matthew Popowycz - Coding and Modeling

Zarin Vandyk - Coding and Modeling

Sam Thanapon Ponpadung - Environment

Bailey Butler - Design

Chris Dichmann - Design

Thaine Vandyk - Music
